header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Neighbours near ANON’s new home DIY Local news Trains ANON’s new job Gardening Food ANON/ANON’s local pub Books and reading TV series Family – anecdote telling A Local walking group Moving to a new place Tax return ANON’s job Christmas Cultural readjustment Family news Shopping ANON’s course and birthday
header.activity: Family talking about ANON’s new home and neighbourhood

speaker.fls: Spanish -- level unspecified; Japanese -- level unspecified

body.u: your house is warm enough for you?
yes it's a bit cold upstairs at the moment cos there's something not quite right with the heating but downstairs it's good
well are you warm in the bed?
yes cos I've put two duvets
and that's the main thing you can't get to sleep can you?
I expect you've got a sleeping bag and a duvet?
yes well get into that it'll be worth it
and have you met any of your neighbours yet?
erm I met the oh yes they're good yes thank you
so what do I owe you altogether?
oh okay alright well I'll have a look next time
and I just felt for you so here
yes so they exactly they're a bit like these doors aren't they?
they've got a sort of cross in the middle
I would do it sort of in line with that
if you had to do that yourself would that be a problem?
I did do the chairs all by myself
but I wouldn't be very confident drilling into a wall for example
well I know it's really upsetting cos if you make a mess of it of your new house
yes because if you put furniture together then
but yes if you went into a wall wrong
wouldn't be very happy about that
that wouldn't be a good idea
er so you met some neighbours did you say?
yes have you seen them since?
with dad the first day no I've never seen them again
it's a bit strange round there that street's very quiet that one
it's at right angle to you is it?
no they're at the end on the corner
on the end of the same street? or
so if you on the way out
and the first one on your right
and then I met the other people who were directly opposite to the right in the big detached one
once the man I met and his father-in-law but they haven't moved in at the time they were just moving in erm but I've not seen them again and I've never met the wife
and then they've put up two buy to let or to let signs as someone's done buy to let one two doors down from me and one opposite
that whole roa that whole terrace opposite no one seems to be living in although the one at the end does have someone's personal effects but they're not there
and the lady next door seems to have gone away cos her car's never there now
so a couple of people have bought them to let them?
the other way if you don't
the one the terraced at er detached at the end isn't finished
they're still all going inside the builders they dug up the road this week I said what are you doing? I couldn't get into my parking space
they'd dug up several places in the road in front of me they said oh we thought it was there but it we were told it was there and it wasn't so then we had to dig up over there
and now they have to re-tarmac the whole thing again
the truck's not coming with the tarmac don't know maybe next week so they've messed it up but it's fine they've filled in the holes now
get out again but it's not tarmacked now back to square one oh and they've the bit where they were coming through with the JCBs about what pretty much next door to me
that's all they've put the fence up now
so they can't any more cos it was all mud wasn't it?
and churned it all up so that's all closed off so they can only walk around now that's probably better
so I see the workmen a lot they're the only people I see on the road cos it's sort of their shortcut to the car park
mm right okay oh right yes
but they can only walk now they can't drive
yes I know them I know what they're doing
and they're very friendly they tell me what they're doing
oh good and it's good you've joined the choir because at least that's something you don't know the people in your road cos all that they aren't there
at least you know somebody else

once it's okay there's not loads there I mean it's good for sort of top up shopping I thought
you know I can get if I run out of milk
can get milk and bread there but I wouldn't do like main shop there
I'll just drive to once a week the big Tesco
and then fill up the car while I'm there

quarter of an hour but it's worth it cos the prices
and there's more choice and they've got everything there haven't they?
could buy clothes and things for the car

gone off them now I've gone off bananas
